entities.name: GraphEngine
entities.description: The main class managing in-memory graph operations, traversal, and analysis using Graphology.

entities.name: Graphology
entities.description: The foundational JavaScript library providing core graph data structures and metrics.

entities.name: MultiDirectedGraph
entities.description: The specific graph representation used internally by GraphEngine, allowing multiple directed edges.

entities.name: Database
entities.description: SQLite database interface (from bun:sqlite) used for loading persistent graph data.

entities.name: ResonanceDB
entities.description: The specific SQLite database referenced for loading the graph structure (hollow nodes).

entities.name: GraphNode
entities.description: Interface defining the structure and attributes of nodes (id, type, title, domain, layer, date).

entities.name: GraphEdge
entities.description: Interface defining the structure of edges (source, target, type).

entities.name: PageRank
entities.description: Centrality metric used to quantify node authority.

entities.name: Betweenness Centrality
entities.description: Centrality metric quantifying a node's control over information flow.

entities.name: Louvain Community Detection
entities.description: Algorithm used by GraphEngine to group nodes into communities.

entities.name: Adamic-Adar Index
entities.description: Link prediction metric calculated based on shared neighbors and their degrees.

entities.name: Shortest Path
entities.description: Unweighted bidirectional search used for finding the path between two nodes.

entities.name: Pillars
entities.description: Nodes identified as authorities, primarily based on high PageRank score.

entities.name: bun:sqlite
entities.description: Module providing SQLite database connectivity for loading.

relationships.description: GraphEngine encapsulates and manages the internal graph data using MultiDirectedGraph.
GraphEngine uses the Database object to query and load graph structure (nodes/edges).
ResonanceDB is the specified origin for the graph data.
GraphEngine implements the detectCommunities method using this algorithm.
GraphEngine provides functionality to compute PageRank centrality.
GraphEngine calculates the Adamic-Adar index to find structural candidates for new edges.
Pillar nodes are derived from the results of the PageRank calculation.
MultiDirectedGraph is the core class provided by the Graphology library.
Graphology metrics utilities include the PageRank algorithm.
Graphology traversal utilities provide the shortest path algorithm.
The Database type is imported from the bun:sqlite module.
The Database stores node records corresponding to the GraphNode interface.
